dcterms:creator: Philip Mehrgardt
Matloob Khushi
Simon Poon
Anusha Withana
dcterms:description: A high-resolution and time-synchronized dataset annotated with activity labels. It contains waveform records from multi-wavelength sensors measuring PPGs, attachment pressures, and temperatures. The recordings are from 22 healthy subjects performing different physical activities in random order.
dcterms:title: Pulse Transit Time PPG (PTT-PPG) public dataset

dcterms:creator: Attila Reiss
Ina Indlekofer
Philip Schmidt
Kristof Van Laerhoven
dcterms:description: A dataset collected to perform PPG-based heart rate estimation, containing recordings of 15 subjects performing different daily activities.
dcterms:title: PPG-Dalia public dataset
